Compete [i](At the end of each of combat, you get a score counter for each opponent you attacked this turn. Spend six score counters as a sorcery to create Trophy tokens.)[/i]
Whenever an opponent casts their first noncreature spell each turn, proliferate unless that player pays {X}, where X is the number of score counters you have.
notes: Whenever an opponent casts their first noncreature spell each turn, proliferate unless that opponent pays X. Where X is the number of score counters you have.
